message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this incredible product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm asking for $2,300,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $2,300,000. I'm willing to pay $1,800,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up on the price. While your offer is generous, the value this product brings to the table is truly exceptional.  I'm willing to come down to $2,100,000. I believe this reflects a fair compromise.

I understand that the product has exceptional value, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $2,100,000. I'm willing to pay $1,900,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise, considering my budget and the value I can get out of it.
